title: Album Page, "Sketch of Column in Gothic Style, Chapel at Amboise, France", late 19th century
medium: Graphite on off-white wove paper with pre-printed blue ink ruled lines, mounted to thick, off-white laid paper tipped into binding with fabric
inscribed: Recto, in graphite, upper right corner of ruled sheet: 129; lower right corner: 122; upper right of drawing: on next page for top of this; bottom right  of drawing: Chapel at Amboise.
dimensions:
Sheet: 21.5 x 17.1 cm (8 7/16 x 6 3/4 in.), irregular
Mount: 32 x 24.7 cm (12 5/8 x 9 3/4 in.), irregular
description: Vertical sheet illustrating a column in the Gothic style consisting of a very tall base with an elongated midsection with carved tri-cusped arch.  To the right is a detail of the base of the midsection, showing that it is hollowed out so that the interior is concave and framed by slender engaged colonettes on either side.

tombstone.epitaph: Album Page, "Sketch of Column in Gothic Style, Chapel at Amboise, France", late 19th century.Graphite on off-white wove paper with pre-printed blue ink ruled lines, mounted to thick, off-white laid paper tipped into binding with fabric. Gift of Mrs. William Greenough. 1943-51-298.
